short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is running scantiki APIs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan-tiki is an drop-shipment website, which provides all required components for business, Scan-tiki allows you to list or add product from various stores to eBay. Tiki-tool provides tool to compare products from various sites with eBay products, also it helps user to find correct product to list on eBay.
